hh3cLswIgmpsnoopingMib.name: hh3cLswIgmpsnoopingMib
hh3cLswIgmpsnoopingMib.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085

EnabledStatus.name: EnabledStatus
EnabledStatus.description: A simple status value for the object.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge
hh3cIgmpSnoopingRouterPortAge.description: Configure the aging time of the router port.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingResponseTime.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingResponseTime
hh3cIgmpSnoopingResponseTime.description: Configure the maximum query response time.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingHostTime.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingHostTime
hh3cIgmpSnoopingHostTime.description: Configure the aging time of the multicast group port.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitTable.description: The table lists the maximum group number that one interface could do IGMP Snooping.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) representing the maximum group number on an interface which IGMP Snooping operation is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP snooping is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupLimitNumber.description: The maxmum group number of IGMP Snooping on a port.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable
hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveTable.description: The table specifies the fast leave status on those ports that do IGMP Snooping.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry
hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveEntry.description: An entry specifies the fast leave status on those ports that do IGMP Snooping.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex
hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP snooping is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus
hh3cIgmpSnoopingFastLeaveStatus.description: The fast leave status of the port on which IGMP Snooping is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyTable.description: This is a table specifies the group policy parameter and Vlan ID of the IGMP Snooping port.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyEntry.description: An entry representing the group policy parameter and Vlan ID of a port on which IGMP Snooping operation is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the port on which IGMP Snooping is enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyVlanID.description: The Vlan ID which the IGMP Snooping port is attached to.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyParameter.description: The ACL Number which is used as the group policy parameter of the IGMP Snooping port.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus
hh3cIgmpSnoopingGroupPolicyStatus.description: This object is used to create or delete a row and represent the current status of this row. Now support three state:CreateAndGo,Active,Destroy.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus
hh3cIgmpSnoopingNonFloodingStatus.description: Configure to disable multicast flooding when no member exists in the destinated group. To use this function,IGMP snooping must be enabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable
hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusTable.description: The table used to enable or disable IGMP snooping on the specified VLAN.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry
hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanStatusEntry.description: An entry representing the IGMP snooping status on the specified VLAN.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanID.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanID
hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanID.description: An index uniquely identifies on which VLAN IGMP snooping is enabled or disabled.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled
hh3cIgmpSnoopingVlanEnabled.description: Indicating whether IGMP snooping is enabled on this VLAN.

hh3cRecvIGMPGQueryNum.name: hh3cRecvIGMPGQueryNum
hh3cRecvIGMPGQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP general query packets received on the device.

hh3cRecvIGMPSQueryNum.name: hh3cRecvIGMPSQueryNum
hh3cRecvIGMPSQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP specific query packets received on the device.

hh3cRecvIGMPV1ReportNum.name: hh3cRecvIGMPV1ReportNum
hh3cRecvIGMPV1ReportNum.description: The statistics of IGMP V1 report packets received on the device.

hh3cRecvIGMPV2ReportNum.name: hh3cRecvIGMPV2ReportNum
hh3cRecvIGMPV2ReportNum.description: The statistics of IGMP V2 report packets received on the device.

hh3cRecvIGMPLeaveNum.name: hh3cRecvIGMPLeaveNum
hh3cRecvIGMPLeaveNum.description: The statistics of IGMP leave packets received on the device.

hh3cRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum.name: hh3cRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum
hh3cRecvErrorIGMPPacketNum.description: The statistics of error IGMP packets received on the device.

hh3cSentIGMPSQueryNum.name: hh3cSentIGMPSQueryNum
hh3cSentIGMPSQueryNum.description: The statistics of IGMP specific query packets sent from the device.

hh3cIgmpSnoopingClearStats.name: hh3cIgmpSnoopingClearStats
hh3cIgmpSnoopingClearStats.description: The configuration to clear the statistics of IGMP packets.
